dcterms:creator: Eduardo José da S. Luz
Thiago M. Nunes
Victor Hugo C. de Albuquerque
João P. Papa
David Menotti
dcterms:description: The MIT-BIH Arrhythmia database contains 48 half hour recordings of two channel ambulatory ECG, obtained from 47 subjects in the year 1975 and 1979 by the Beth-Israel Hospital Arrhythmia Laboratory at Boston. The recordings were digitized at 360 samples per second per channel with 11-bit resolution over a 10 mV range.
dcterms:title: MIT-BIH Arrhythmia Dataset

dcterms:description: The European ST-T database consists of 90 annotated samples of ambulatory ECG recordings from 79 subjects having myocardial ischemia disease. Each record is of 2 h duration and contains two signals.
dcterms:title: European ST-T Dataset

dcterms:description: The EEG dataset from the University of Bonn consists of five sets (A–E) containing 100 single-channel EEG segments each with a duration of 23.6 s, recorded from healthy volunteers and epileptic patients.
dcterms:title: EEG Dataset from the University of Bonn

dcterms:description: The BCI Competitions II, III, and IV datasets consist of various EEG data collected for brain-computer interface research, with different sampling rates.
dcterms:title: BCI Competitions II, III, and IV Datasets
